description:
Driver for DisplayLink USB graphics chipsets incorporated in your dock, adapter or monitor


DisplayLink software release 12.2 delivers:
- New features:
    - DL-7xxx DP 1.4 FEC Support.
- General stability updates and bug fixes.

C1. Issues Fixed Since 12.1 M0 Release (12.1.2424.0)
Issues Fixed in 12.2 M0 Release (12.2.1932.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-7xxx: Resolved an issue where a mode not supported by the monitor could be applied (VIFR-7017).

Issues Fixed in 12.1 M2 Release (12.1.2853.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- Addressed an issue where the device driver would occasionally crash when resuming from sleep (S3 state) (VIFR-6913).

Issues Fixed in 12.1 M1 Release (12.1.2591.0)
----------------------------------------------------
- DL-7xxx: Addressed an issue where the display would occasionally fail to reappear after resuming from sleep (S3 state) (VIFR-6796).
